The number of cold calls, automated calls, txt messages and unsolicited telemarketing regarding PPI and other similar schemes is becoming an uncontrollable nuisance to daily life.  I would like the following law introduced:
To make it a legal requirement for all companies who use tele-sales techniques, automated call services and land and mobile phone calling methods to register their head office address and used telephone numbers on a central database accessible by the public for the purpose of registering complaints and grievances for such calls that have become a nuisance to the general public.
